(ACTIVITY_CODE IN ('1102', '1111', '1112', '1113', '1117', '1119', '1120', '1130', '1136', '1139', '1150', '1152', '1153', '1154', '1160', '1180', '2000', '2341', '2360', '2370', '2530', '2540', '2560', '3132', '3340', '3370', '3380', '4101', '4102', '4111', '4113', '4115', '4117', '4121', '4122', '4131', '4132', '4141', '4142', '4143', '4145', '4146', '4148', '4151', '4152', '4162', '4175', '4177', '4183', '4192', '4193', '4194', '4196', '4210', '4211', '4220', '4231', '4232', '4241', '4242', '4270', '4455', '4471', '4472', '4473', '4474', '4475', '4481', '4482', '4483', '4484', '4485', '4491', '4492', '4493', '4494', '4495', '4511', '4521', '4530', '4540', '4541', '6101', '6103', '6104', '6105', '6106', '6107', '6133', '6584', '6684', '7015', '7050', '7065', '7067', '9008', '9400', '4110', '4112', '4114', '4116', '4120', '4123', '4133', '4134', '4140', '4144', '4147', '4150', '4154', '4160', '4176', '4186', '4195', '4200', '4233', '4230', '4240', '4470', '4480', '4490', '4512', '4522', '4542', '4580') And FUELS_KEYPOINT_AREA NOT IN ('0', '2')) Or (ACTIVITY_CODE = '2510' And FUELS_KEYPOINT_AREA IN ('3', '6'))
